title: Free Software for Windows for Engineering Students
heading: Free today and always.
description: Find programs like Proteus, MATLAB, MathCAD, Multisim, among others, for free.
softawreDescription: Choose the one that best suits your needs with the best available tools.

cards.title: Proteus
cards.description: Proteus 8 is a tool for designing and simulating electronic circuits.

cards.title: Multisim
cards.description: Multisim is a SPICE simulation software for designing and analyzing electronic circuits.

cards.title: MathCAD
cards.description: MathCAD is a technical calculation tool that allows you to perform, analyze, and share engineering calculations.

contactText: If you want to contribute or add something, send us a message and we will gladly include it. Thank you for making this community bigger.
